Uses of Class
com.i2group.apollo.service.common.RequestTooLargeException

  • Packages that use RequestTooLargeException 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice
    The standard i2 Analyze item history service provides clients with the ability to look at the changes that items have undergone as a result of edit and merge operations. The service also enables clients to examine the differences between two versions of an item.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

    • Uses of RequestTooLargeException in com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.itemhistoryservice that throw RequestTooLargeException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MergeHistory> IItemHistoryService.retrieveMergeHistories(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers, int depth)
      Retrieves MergeHistorys that contain summary information about any Items that were merged to create the specified Items, up to the specified depth.
      List<MergePopulation> IItemHistoryService.retrieveMergePopulations(List<ItemIdentifier> itemIdentifiers)
      Retrieves a MergePopulation for each of the specified Items, containing summary information about all the Items that have been merged into the Item, and all the Items into which its content has been merged.
      List<MergeProductResult> IItemHistoryService.retrieveMergeProducts(List<ItemIdentifier> sourceItemIdentifiers)
      Retrieves MergeProductResults that contain summary information about the most recent Items to which each of the specified Items have contributed content, through merge operations.
